options.text: Make an Excuse About Missing the Date

nodes.text: I am so sorry, Esme, but after Terk sent me back to my room, I found a note from my mother waiting for me. She wrote to tell me that she has been very ill.
I immediately snuck away from the castle and went home to check up on her. She's starting to get better now. I hope she'll be all right.
Please forgive me for missing our date... I was so looking forward to it! But I had to make sure that my mother was not dying...
Is okay, Shawn, I understand. I hope your mother vill be vell soon.
Is odd your mother sends you letter when she is so very sick...
I'm so sorry, Esme. I've been hoping for a date with you since the moment I first saw you. But after Sosi acted like such a rotter, I was afraid you'd like I was just like him.
That's why I took so long to ask you out. I wanted you to get to know me better. I treasure every moment we are together. You are the most amazing person I've ever met.
Please forgive me - because I'll never forgive myself for letting you down by missing our date.
Is sad ve never got to date. I vas looking forvard to it, too.
Is odd. You find me so amazing, yet you cannot keep one date vith me! You are clearly not very good for me.
Oh... you thought I meant to date you on that very same night? Sorry, I thought I made it clear to you to meet with me tonight. You must have misheard me.
I had tonight all planned out. It would be perfect. I have the best wine from the cellar, some fine chocolates I bought off the black market, and a special gift just fot you.
<sigh> Such a shame we had this misunderstanding. I guess we'll never have that perfect date...
But... but... ve could still meet later tonight for that date...
It just wouldn't be the same now that I see how angry you were over a mere misunderstanding. Perhaps another time...
I make no mistake! You stand me up, you lying, dirty, cheating, piece of rotten raven meat!
So what are you planning on doing after this semester is over?
Aeolus asked me to visit his family home in Sossari during break. Sounds like fun thing.
I vill be staying in Caligari for a bit. Maybe ve can see one another if you like.
Oh, I like very much!
I vill be going vith Katie to stay at her inn vhile she vaits for her father to return. Is nice she has real home to go back to.
Of all the people I've ever met, you are definitely the most exciting and fun to be around.
I think you are pretty good, too. Is always fun vith you.
You are nice guy, Shawn, but Aeolus is more fun.
You say nice things, Shawn, but you are not nice. You are just sneakier at being nasty than Sosi.
You are very sveet, Shawn. Is fun vith you.
Shall we start shuffling the cards and get this game started?
Yes, ve shall!
I hope we get a chance to talk more later.
I do not vant to talk vith you.
Maybe so.
